Marion Dehner

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: L. Goeury
  3. Foster Family Alt: Laura or Leona Geoury
  4. Location of Family: Exeter, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Unknown
  7. Age on Arrival: 6
  8. Date of Birth: 1896-02-04
  9. Date of Death: 1974-02-07
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Ida Elznic
  12. Spouse Name: Frank Elznic
  13. Source: Crossroads, January 1990 (1) p. 14; E. Thomsen Orphan Train Register #483; ROT A-L Neb. p 3; Eloise Thomsen Corres.; National Orphan Train Complex; Exeter Journal, 7 June 1902; Exeter Journal, 14 June 1902.
